```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(naniar)
library(shiny)
library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)
``` 

Loading data: 
```{r}
chaeto <- readr::read_csv("new_clean_data/chaeto1_clean.csv")
```


```{r}
chaeto
```
```{r}
chaeto_wide <- chaeto %>%
  pivot_wider(
    names_from = "flask",
    values_from = "ph"
  )
chaeto_wide
```

```{r}
ph7_6 <- chaeto_wide%>%
  select(ph1_7_6, ph2_7_6, ph3_7_6)%>%
  rowMeans()
```

```{r}
ph8_2 <- chaeto_wide%>%
  select(ph1_8_2, ph2_8_2, ph3_8_2)%>%
  rowMeans()
```

```{r}
new_chaeto_wide <- cbind(chaeto_wide, ph7_6, ph8_2)
new_chaeto_wide
```

```{r}
new_chaeto_long <- new_chaeto_wide%>%
  select(seconds, ph7_6, ph8_2)%>%
  pivot_longer(-seconds,
    names_to = "ph",
    values_to = "flask"
  )
new_chaeto_long
```
```{r}
new_chaeto_long%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=seconds, y=flask, color=ph))+
  geom_line()
```
